course_description: The Social Media Law course is intended to explore the regulatory principles at play in the ever-changing space of mass communication via technology. The objective is to provide students foundational, experiential information, so that they are equipped to be practicing attorneys and contributors to the social media legal ecosystem. As such, students will be engaged and challenged with multiple graded assignments in addition to vibrant class discussions.
